short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to keep Netflix playing without having to click the continue button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps Netflix on autoplay by bypassing the "Do you wish to continue watching" prompt that periodically comes up.
